cc.mallet.grmm.types
Interface AssignmentIterator

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.Iterator
public interface AssignmentIterator
extends java.util.Iterator

Iterates over the assignments to a set of variables. This is never instantiated by user code; instead, use one of the many assignmentIterator() methods. DOCTODO: Add note about difference between using this class and iterating over assignments. DOCTODO: Explain why advance() is useful instead of next. Created: Sun Nov 9 21:04:03 2003
